meta.dc:title: HCON 86 ENR: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

main.name: HCONRES86
main.longTitle: CONCURRENT RESOLUTION Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.
main.enactingFormula: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring),

section.content: That the two Houses of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Tuesday, February 4, 2020, at 9 p.m., for the purpose of receiving such communication as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.

signature.role: Clerk of the House of Representatives.
